articles.author: Axios
articles.title: American, Alaska Airlines and JetBlue add staff vaccine mandates - Axios
articles.description: The airlines say because they provide government services they must comply with President Biden's mandatory vaccination directive.
articles.content:
American Airlines, JetBlue and Alaska Airlines have joined United Airlines in mandating that employees must be vaccinated against COVID-19, per the Wall Street Journal.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Thousands of women march across US in support of abortion rights - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: American women fear more states could roll back abortion rights after Texas imposes a near-total ban on the procedure.
articles.content:
Tens of thousands of women have marched across cities in the United States to protest increasing restrictions on abortion.
